snippet.title: Cairn - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Reach a summit never climbed before in this mountain ascent adventure from the creators of Furi and Haven. 

Wishlist Cairn: https://bit.ly/Cairn-Steam     
Website: https://www.thegamebakers.com/cairn
Links: https://thegamebakers.carrd.co/

As seasoned climber Aava, embark on the ascent of Mount Kami, a summit that has never been reached. Discover the mountain's history and decide what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent.

Cairn features realistic simulation that allows you to climb intuitively, anywhere. Find the best holds and place your hands and feet seamlessly with simple controls. Adapt your posture, effort and balance - if you're not careful, you will fall!
